name: Jon Shafer's At the Gates
description: At the Gates is an indie strategy game from Jon Shafer, designer of Civilization 5. You are a dark age lord building a kingdom to replace the crumbling Roman Empire. Manage your clans, explore the landscape around you, harvest its resources, and build a mighty economic and military machine.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Vista/7 Processor: 1.6 Ghz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: X1950 Pro, 7900 GT DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 2 GB available space
